name: Mission ∞
description:
You’re saviour of our solar system. As best of bests you’re chosen to defeat alien civilisation that want to take our home from us! Be quick, their technology surpases ours. Let them not use it!

Made for Ludum Dare 47 Jam.

WASD - move

SPACE - dash

Mouse - aim & shoot

R - reload

P - restart game

M - mute music

ryzy27 - code

szupinek - art

Kate90 - audio
